jetpack-related-posts.title: Official Cover Art
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hey everyone! Recently, one of the artists who is working with me to make the box of the game finished drawing the cover of the box. I've put a sample of the image below. This sample is really not doing justice to the original, and it won't actually look like this…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Promotional Flyer
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hey everyone! Just thought I'd share with you a flyer I made for Dagers High. It's just a short intro to the game that might end up on the box, or somewhere else. Let me know what you think in the comments and subscribe if you enjoy this content!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Components List and Changes
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hey everyone! I'm back from hiatus with a list of the components in Daggers High. I've decided to do one post each week on Fridays, starting next week, so look out for those! A couple of notes on the components. I made a couple of changes to the sizes and…

jetpack-related-posts.title: New Club Design
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hi everyone! Today I wanted to show you a small change to the club cards that will hopefully make it easier for newer players to understand clubs. I've found that newer players tend to avoid clubs because they are confusing to understand. This aesthetic change hopes to make them more…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Translating Printing Terms: A Guide to Tabletop Game Printing
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hey everyone! I'm by no means an expert in the arena of manufacturing tabletop board games, but after struggling a bit to find this information online I thought I would write a short guide. Please let me know if any of this information is incorrect or inaccurate. Anyway, here are…
